00023 #include <cassert>
00024 #include "dualcon.h"
00025 #include "ModelReader.h"
00026 #include "octree.h"
00027 
00028 #include <cstdio>
00029 #include <float.h>
00030 
00031 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__MINGW32__)
00032 #define isnan(n) _isnan(n)
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 void veccopy(float dst[3], const float src[3])
00036 {
00037     dst[0] = src[0];
00038     dst[1] = src[1];
00039     dst[2] = src[2];
00040 }
00041 
00042 #define GET_FACE(_mesh, _n) \
00043     (*(DualConFaces)(((char*)(_mesh)->faces) + ((_n) * (_mesh)->face_stride)))
00044 
00045 #define GET_CO(_mesh, _n) \
00046     (*(DualConCo)(((char*)(_mesh)->co) + ((_n) * (_mesh)->co_stride)))
00047 
00048 class DualConInputReader : public ModelReader
00049 {
00050 private:
00051     const DualConInput *input_mesh;
00052     int tottri, curface, offset;
00053     float min[3], max[3], maxsize;
00054     float scale;
00055 public:
00056     DualConInputReader(const DualConInput *mesh, float _scale)
00057     : input_mesh(mesh), scale(_scale)
00058     {
00059         reset();
00060     }
00061 
00062     void reset()
00063     {
00064         tottri = 0;
00065         curface = 0;
00066         offset = 0;
00067         maxsize = 0;
00068 
00069         /* initialize tottri */
00070         for(int i = 0; i < input_mesh->totface; i++)
00071             tottri += GET_FACE(input_mesh, i)[3] ? 2 : 1;
00072 
00073         veccopy(min, input_mesh->min);
00074         veccopy(max, input_mesh->max);
00075 
00076         /* initialize maxsize */
00077         for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00078             float d = max[i] - min[i];
00079             if(d > maxsize)
00080                 maxsize = d;
00081         }
00082 
00083         /* redo the bounds */
00084         for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00085         {
00086             min[i] = (max[i] + min[i]) / 2 - maxsize / 2;
00087             max[i] = (max[i] + min[i]) / 2 + maxsize / 2;
00088         }
00089 
00090         for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00091             min[i] -= maxsize * (1 / scale - 1) / 2;
00092         maxsize *= 1 / scale;
00093     }
00094 
00095     Triangle* getNextTriangle()
00096     {
00097         if(curface == input_mesh->totface)
00098             return 0;
00099 
00100         Triangle* t = new Triangle();
00101         
00102         unsigned int *f = GET_FACE(input_mesh, curface);
00103         if(offset == 0) {
00104             veccopy(t->vt[0], GET_CO(input_mesh, f[0]));
00105             veccopy(t->vt[1], GET_CO(input_mesh, f[1]));
00106             veccopy(t->vt[2], GET_CO(input_mesh, f[2]));
00107         }
00108         else {
00109             veccopy(t->vt[0], GET_CO(input_mesh, f[2]));
00110             veccopy(t->vt[1], GET_CO(input_mesh, f[3]));
00111             veccopy(t->vt[2], GET_CO(input_mesh, f[0]));
00112         }
00113 
00114         if(offset == 0 && f[3])
00115             offset++;
00116         else {
00117             offset = 0;
00118             curface++;
00119         }
00120 
00121         /* remove triangle if it contains invalid coords */
00122         for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00123             const float *co = t->vt[i];
00124             if(isnan(co[0]) || isnan(co[1]) || isnan(co[2])) {
00125                 delete t;
00126                 return getNextTriangle();
00127             }
00128         }
00129 
00130         return t;
00131     }
00132 
00133     int getNextTriangle(int t[3])
00134     {
00135         if(curface == input_mesh->totface)
00136             return 0;
00137         
00138         unsigned int *f = GET_FACE(input_mesh, curface);
00139         if(offset == 0) {
00140             t[0] = f[0];
00141             t[1] = f[1];
00142             t[2] = f[2];
00143         }
00144         else {
00145             t[0] = f[2];
00146             t[1] = f[3];
00147             t[2] = f[0];
00148         }
00149 
00150         if(offset == 0 && f[3])
00151             offset++;
00152         else {
00153             offset = 0;
00154             curface++;
00155         }
00156 
00157         return 1;
00158     }
00159 
00160     int getNumTriangles()
00161     {
00162         return tottri;
00163     }
00164 
00165     int getNumVertices()
00166     {
00167         return input_mesh->totco;
00168     }
00169 
00170     float getBoundingBox(float origin[3])
00171     {
00172         veccopy(origin, min);
00173         return maxsize ;
00174     }
00175 
00176     /* output */
00177     void getNextVertex(float v[3])
00178     {
00179         /* not used */
00180     }
00181 
00182     /* stubs */
00183     void printInfo() {}
00184     int getMemory() { return sizeof(DualConInputReader); }
00185 };
00186 
00187 void *dualcon(const DualConInput *input_mesh,
00188               /* callbacks for output */
00189               DualConAllocOutput alloc_output,
00190               DualConAddVert add_vert,
00191               DualConAddQuad add_quad,
00192                      
00193               DualConFlags flags,
00194               DualConMode mode,
00195               float threshold,
00196               float hermite_num,
00197               float scale,
00198               int depth)
00199 {
00200     DualConInputReader r(input_mesh, scale);
00201     Octree o(&r, alloc_output, add_vert, add_quad,
00202              flags, mode, depth, threshold, hermite_num);
00203     o.scanConvert();
00204     return o.getOutputMesh();
00205 }
